datan

Class SmallSample

  • java.lang.Object
    • datan.SmallSample

  • public final class SmallSample
extends java.lang.Object
    A class providing methods to compute confidence limits for small samples
    Author:
    Siegmund Brandt.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SmallSample() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double lambdaSignalMinus(int k, double beta, double lambdaback)
      Returns the confidence limit lambda_signal- for a small sample in the presence of background.
      static double lambdaSignalPlus(int k, double beta, double lambdaback)
      Returns the confidence limit lambda_signal+ for a small sample in the presence of background.
      static double lambdaSignalUpper(int k, double beta, double lambdaback)
      Returns the confidence limit lambda_signal(up) for a small sample in the presence of background.
      static double ratioSignalMinus(int k, int d, double beta, double ratioback)
      Returns the confidence limit r_signal- for the ratio of signal and reference events in the presence of background.
      static double ratioSignalPlus(int k, int d, double beta, double ratioback)
      Returns the confidence limit r_signal+ for the ratio of signal and reference events in the presence of background.
      static double ratioSignalUpper(int k, int d, double beta, double ratioback)
      Returns the confidence limit r_signal(up) for the ratio of signal and reference events in the presence of background.

      • lambdaSignalMinus

        public static double lambdaSignalMinus(int k,
                       double beta,
                       double lambdaback)
        Returns the confidence limit lambda_signal- for a small sample in the presence of background.
        Parameters:
        k - number of observed events
        beta - confidence level.
        lambdaback - Poisson parameter of background.
        Returns:
        lambda_signal-.

        public static double ratioSignalMinus(int k,
                      int d,
                      double beta,
                      double ratioback)
        Returns the confidence limit r_signal- for the ratio of signal and reference events in the presence of background.
        Parameters:
        k - number of observed events..
        d - number of reference events.
        beta - confidence level.
        ratioback - expected ratio of background to reference events.

        r_signal-.
